name: Hallways of Andromeda
description:
Es un demo, el objetivo es encontrar los interruptores en orden y activarlos, al terminar de activarlos, debes regresar al principio, al teletransportador y así terminaria.

Constantemente iremos actualizando el demo.

It's a demo, the objetive is find the switches and activates them, when you finish activating them, you must go back to the beginning, to the teleporter and that's how it ends.

We will constantly update the demo.
